Deficiency Narrative: The current administrator is unable to be physically at the operation and have daily supervision and responsibility of the overall operation.
Correction Narrative: The current licensed administrator and the operation parted ways as of 08/08/2025. The operation advised them awaiting background checks for another licensed administrator before they are able to hire.

Deficiency Narrative: Three of 3 employee records reviewed did not have a complete notarized Licensing Affidavit for Applicants.
Correction Narrative: Form 2985 was shared with the operation. The operation updated all current employee file to include the affidavit. The operation updated the procedure to include the affidavit for future employees.

Deficiency Narrative: The operation does not have 60 square feet of space for each occupant in the first floor bedroom 2 and second floor bedroom 3.
Correction Narrative: The operation responded by removing extra beds and provided photos to show the changes.

Deficiency Narrative: At the time of inspection, an employee did not have a completed notarized Licensing Affidavit.
Correction Narrative: In response to the deficiency, the operation updated form 2985 and it was notarized.

Deficiency Narrative: At the time of inspection, the operation did not have policies and procedures for suicide prevention, intervention, and postvention consistent with 748.124.
Correction Narrative: In response to the deficiency, the operation submitted updated policies and procedures for suicide prevention, intervention, and postvention consistent with 748.124.

Deficiency Narrative: The emergency evacuation and relocation diagram does not show the designated area inside the operation where staff and children will meet to shelter from bad weather.
Correction Narrative: In response to the deficiency, the operation updated emergency evacuation and relocation diagram to show where staff and children will meet in the operation to shelter from bad weather.

Deficiency Narrative: At the time of inspection, operation plans, policies, and procedures did not show the date they were adopted and effective.
Correction Narrative: In response to the deficiencies, the operation officially updated policies and procedures to be adopted by the board.

Deficiency Narrative: At the time of inspection, there was no documentation to show that references were contacted prior to hiring an employee.
Correction Narrative: In response to the deficiency, the operation provided documentation to show references were contacted prior to hiring an employee. The operation also updated personnel policies to reflect the procedures for conducting references and storing the reference check results in each individual employee file.

Deficiency Narrative: At the time of inspection, the operation did not policies and procedures for conducting reference checks for potential employees.
Correction Narrative: In response to the deficiency, the operation developed and provided a Pre-Employment Screening Template they will use to document reference checks. Policies and procedures were also updated and submitted and evaluated to meet compliance with 748.105(3).

Deficiency Narrative: At the time of inspection, a pile of tree branches towards the back of the property and solar walkway lights piled in the front garden bed.
Correction Narrative: In response to the deficiency, the operation removed the pile of branches, pile of solar walkway lights, and parked car were removed.

Deficiency Narrative: The emergency evacuation and relocation diagram does not show the area outside the operation where caregivers and children will meet.
Correction Narrative: In response to the deficiency, the operation updated emergency evacuation and relocation diagram to show where staff and children will meet outside the operation to evacuate.
